title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2001 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 457.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 131.0 was recorded at Year 2001
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2001 to 2013.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2018.
